news_header: Trump warns of ending ceasefire if hostages are not released.
news_original_title: Trump: Aselevon pitäisi päättyä lauantaina, jos kaikkia Gazassa olevia panttivankeja ei vapauteta
news_text: President Trump stated that if all Israeli hostages in Gaza are not released by noon next Saturday, he will propose to cancel the ceasefire between Israel and Hamas, claiming that 'hell will be released.' He mentioned that the decision to end the ceasefire lies with Israel and indicated he might discuss this with Israeli Prime Minister Netanyahu. Meanwhile, Hamas accused Israel of breaching the ceasefire agreement and threatened to delay the planned release of hostages.
